00083 class EGS_LINE_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_LineShape : public EGS_BaseShape {
00084 
00085 public:
00086 
00087     EGS_LineShape(const vector<EGS_Float> &points, const string &Name="",
00088             EGS_ObjectFactory *f=0);
00089     ~EGS_LineShape() {
00090         if( n > 0 ) {
00091             delete table; delete [] x; delete [] y;
00092         }
00093     };
00094     EGS_Vector getPoint(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) {
00095         int j = table->sampleBin(rndm);
00096         EGS_Float eta = rndm->getUniform(); EGS_Float eta1 = 1 - eta;
00097         return EGS_Vector(x[j]*eta+x[j+1]*eta1,y[j]*eta+y[j+1]*eta1,0);
00098     };
00099 
00100 protected:
00101 
00102     int  n;  // number of line segments
00103     EGS_Float *x, *y;
00104     EGS_AliasTable    *table;
00105 
00106 };
00107 
00108 #endif
